properties.Name: ReferenceGroup
properties.Description:
Reference groups have both direct and indirect influence on consumer behavior and attitudes.

Membership in and aspirations to belong to reference groups expose individuals to products, influence behavior, attitudes and create pressure to conform to reference group behavior, activities and attitudes.

Ex:
-  Family
-  Co-workers
-  Pre-teen peers
-  Teenage peers
-  Parenting families

Columns.Name: ReferenceGroupId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reference Group.

Columns.Name: ReferenceGroupName
Columns.Description: The name of the Reference Group.

Columns.Name: ReferenceGroupDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Reference Group.
